  • django.contrib.gis.gdal.prototypes.geom

Source code for django.contrib.gis.gdal.prototypes.geom

from ctypes import POINTER, c_char_p, c_double, c_int, c_void_p

from django.contrib.gis.gdal.envelope import OGREnvelope
from django.contrib.gis.gdal.libgdal import lgdal
from django.contrib.gis.gdal.prototypes.errcheck import check_envelope
from django.contrib.gis.gdal.prototypes.generation import (
    const_string_output,
    double_output,
    geom_output,
    int_output,
    srs_output,
    string_output,
    void_output,
)


# ### Generation routines specific to this module ###


[docs]
def env_func(f, argtypes):
    "For getting OGREnvelopes."
    f.argtypes = argtypes
    f.restype = None
    f.errcheck = check_envelope
    return f






[docs]
def pnt_func(f):
    "For accessing point information."
    return double_output(f, [c_void_p, c_int])






[docs]
def topology_func(f):
    f.argtypes = [c_void_p, c_void_p]
    f.restype = c_int
    f.errcheck = lambda result, func, cargs: bool(result)
    return f




# ### OGR_G ctypes function prototypes ###

# GeoJSON routines.


[docs]
from_json = geom_output(lgdal.OGR_G_CreateGeometryFromJson, [c_char_p])




[docs]
to_json = string_output(
    lgdal.OGR_G_ExportToJson, [c_void_p], str_result=True, decoding="ascii"
)




[docs]
to_kml = string_output(
    lgdal.OGR_G_ExportToKML, [c_void_p, c_char_p], str_result=True, decoding="ascii"
)



# GetX, GetY, GetZ all return doubles.


[docs]
getx = pnt_func(lgdal.OGR_G_GetX)




[docs]
gety = pnt_func(lgdal.OGR_G_GetY)




[docs]
getz = pnt_func(lgdal.OGR_G_GetZ)

# Destroys a geometry

    lgdal.OGR_G_ExportToWkb, None, errcheck=True
)  # special handling for WKB.
